Long Island Rail Road (LIRR) delays lead to lost economic productivity 
and frustrated commuters.  This application visualizes
LIRR On-Time Performance (OTP) data with the intention of answering the follwing
questions: 

1. Which branches have the best/worst performance? 

2. Which month on average has the best/worst performance?

3. Has performance deteriorated over time?

4. What factors are associated with performance?
